headline: Should Record Results and Capital Returns Prompt a Fresh Look From Howmet Aerospace (HWM) Investors?
summary: In the past quarter, Howmet Aerospace reported record revenue and profit, boosted by strong performance in both commercial and defense aerospace markets, and executed US$125 million in stock repurchases as well as a 20% dividend increase in 2025. Fidelity Growth Strategies Fund and other major investors have cited Howmet's robust results and shareholder-focused actions as key reasons for raising their stakes in the company. We will explore how ongoing stock repurchases and a higher dividend...
